title: What is this font?
content:

Font: 

 Savoye (and Verdana)

comments.content: The first letter is the capital N of **[Savoye](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113831/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Savoye%20Std%20-%20Regular&fid=34e41ec35a86f2f7d6a861cfe4b1523f&fsize=60&text=N&fit=1)** by Alan Meeks, available from Letraset, ITC, Linotype
